description.text: Collection of references to control interfaces supported by the component type, e.g. to elements of the Interface Metadata SMC of the Asset Interface Description submodel, the MTP submodel or OPC UA Server Datasheet submodel.
An interface description
The profile according to which the referred control interface operates.
Supplemental information to further specify the interface.
A reference to a control interface supported by the component type and described by the interfaceProfile and the optional supplement
Collection of all possible error codes that may appear in components of this type.
A container representing an error.

qualifiers.value: To be filled; normally same as idShort, might be with {00}

description.text: The error code.

description.text: Boolean property that defines if the skill is (currently) disabled, e.g. not licensed, tested, suitable.
Collection of operation, operating, operational or execution modes (depending on the standard), in which the skill is available/allowed to execute.
Name of the operation, operating, operational or execution modes (depending on the standard), in which the skill is available/allowed to execute.

description.text: Collection of parameters used for the configuration of the skill.
Parameter used for the configuration of the skill.

qualifiers.value: To be filled; normally same as idShort, might be with {00}

description.text: Indicates whether the parameter is an input (In) or an output (Out) of the skill. An InOut parameter can be set from outside and can also be changed from skill itself.
Data type as string used to interpret the parameter.
Collection of properties of the accepted values that the parameter may take.
Collection of references to the error codes of the component that may be raised by this skill.
